channel.title: CI/CD on erri120's random Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CI/CD on erri120's random Blog

item.title: Reworking rpgmpacker: Moving from C++ to TypeScript
item.description: A quick post explaining my decision of moving from C++ to TypeScript for my project rpgmpacker.

item.title: CI/CD for RPG Maker Game Development
item.description: Are you working on a Game and want to automate your content delivery? RPG Maker MV/MZ have an inbuilt export option but you can't automate it so I created rpgmpacker to help you with that.
